verbs.description: The ladies of " Ocean 's 8 " [V: are] conquering the world one premiere red carpet at a time . Sandra Bullock , Rihanna , Cate Blanchett , Helena Bonham Carter , Mindy Kaling and Sarah Paulson stepped out on Wednesday night for the London premiere of their record - breaking film , with fellow cast members Anne Hathaway and Awkwafina notably absent from the celebratory premiere . Rihanna stole the show in a gold metallic Poiret off - the - shoulder gown with exaggerated sleeves and an asymmetrical hemline . The singer - slash - actress narrowly avoided a wardrobe malfunction when the right side of her dress almost slid a little too far down her shoulder -- but the red carpet veteran handled the moment like a pro and laughed it off after readjusting her neckline . See photos of the moment -- and all of the premiere looks -- in the gallery below : SEE ALSO : ' Ocean 's 8 ' premiere : See what all 8 stars wore on the red carpet ! Sandra Bullock also looked completely stunning in her plunging striped Zuhair Murad jumpsuit that was covered in sequins . The actress was joined by her longtime boyfriend , Bryan Randall , too . Sarah Paulson made a major statement with her look , rocking a pink tiered Valentino number with a slicked - back hairdo and dangling earrings . More from AOL.com : Meghan Markle wears wedding dress designer Givenchy in solo appearances with Queen Elizabeth Paris Jackson cleans graffiti off dad Michael Jackson ’s Hollywood Walk of Fame star Fox News’ Laura Ingraham says Trump should fire EPA chief Scott Pruitt : ‘ Got ta go’
